revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aerohive |model=HiveAP 170 |revision=(AH-AP-170-N-FCC) |upc=700580841832 |asin=B071HHFRDR |fcc_date=09/20/2011 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=managed access point |fcc_id=WBV-HIVEAP170 |ic_id=7774A-HIVEAP170 |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |cpu1_cspeed=680 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=M25P128-VMF6PB |fla1_num=4 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS32M16DS-5TI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, J2,, (9600,8,N,1),, |wi1_module=EnGenius EMP5605H |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX,N-Female |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=EnGenius EMP9605H |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=MMCX,N-Female |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=MV88E1118;MV88E1118-NNC1; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3204T;;1; |flags=outdoor |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user=admin |default_pass=aerohive |oui=88:DC:96 |oui_eth=F0:9C:E9 }} {{TagLine|Outdoor 300Mbps Wireless Access Point}} :[http://www.aerohive.com/pdfs/Aerohive_Datasheet_HiveAP-170-Access-Point.pdf Datasheet]
"HiveAP170-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :A typical ''[[Senao]]'' P/N sticker is also attached to a RAM chip.
On a production model, the "HiveAP170" silkscreen mentioned above is absent and, :instead, the board is branded, "7016A05140 v1.10" above screw hole MH3. There is an unpopulated header, J1, that is presumably JTAG. :Switch SW3 is a reset switch.
{{WiFiCert|WFA12615|08/26/2011}}
